page.title: 16JANET'S AFTERNOON.
page.content: Since I stay near the school I go home for lunch,which consists of chicken soup and salad.Usually I practise my piano music before returning to school in time to start lessons again at 1.30p.m.On Tuesday afternoons the boys have Homecraft lessons(equality of the sexes!)This means that the girls can work on any part of their personal projects and can have more of the teacher's time.I especially enjoy Friday afternoons when we have HOBBIES GROUPS.I like the Hockey,Cookery and Arts and Crafts groups best.I am sorry when 3.30p.m.comes even although it is the end of the week.
